videos.description: Shabazz Napier gets the steal and drops the pass to Maurice Harkless, who throws down the high-flying one-handed slam in the first quarter against the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Napier drops it to Harkless for the flush) 2016/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Napier drops it to Harkless for the flush
